options.text: They use Google Docs for collaborative brainstorming sessions
options.why: Google Docs is widely used for real-time collaboration without additional cost

options.text: Teams use Trello boards for task tracking and project management
options.why: Trello is widely used for visual task management in creative teams.

options.text: Teams use Zoom and email chains for coordination
options.why: Widely used for remote communication, but lacks task integration
